title: Westcott 16968 8-Inch Stainless Steel Rose Gold Scissors For Office and Home
description: Westcott fashion scissors come in an assortment of colors and designs featuring seasonal patterns, metal finishes, unique handles and blade designs. Lightweight yet durable enough for common cutting jobs, these all-purpose scissors feature high-performance stainless steel blades capable of cutting through layers of paper, foam, and poster board. These cute scissors feature heavy-weight, fashionable rose gold handles designed to comfortably accommodate cutting on flat surfaces. Westcott develops home and office products unmatched in style, design, and performance. We continue to deliver results that are both inspirational and functional. Scissors screw is not adjustable and tension should not be modified by the user
